# Introduction

Weeby-JS is the official JavaScript API Wrapper for Weeby API (opens new window).

(opens new window)

# 💾 Installation

npm install weeby-js --save

# ⭐️ Features

  • Super simple and easy to use
  • Built in documentation
  • Includes all methods from Weeby API
  • Object-Oriented
  • Beginner friendly

# 👋🏻 Support

If you have found an issue while using this wrapper or have any suggestions? Feel free to join the NTM Discord Server (opens new window), send an issue (opens new window) or pull request (opens new window). We'll be happy to help and take a look!

# ❤️ Thanks!

Thanks for checking out weeby-js, a NPM module development and maintained by NTM Development.

The team is currently maintaining this, so if you would like to support it's development, Feel free to do so by donating here (opens new window) on Buy me a coffee.

Also, don't forget to star the repo! 😋
